content: needle knit both together through the back loops gauge 8 5 spi any looser and the booties won t stay on start cast on 36 40 stitches join into the round using your favourite technique being careful not to twist the round my favourite method to join up a round of knitting is to pass first cast on stitch over last cast on stitch most methods i ve tried leave a little dip where the join is but this method makes for a completely invisible join to work a join this way cast on one more stitch than the pattern suggests 37 or 41 then slide the last cast on stitch from the right hand needle to the left needle lift the first cast on stitch over it and then return the last cast on stitch back to the right hand needle 36 40 stitches place marker to indicate the start of round this will be the centre back of the bootie work the garter band around the fold down cuff round 1 knit round 2 purl round 3 knit round 4 purl work the cuff rounds 5-14 knit round 15 purl round 16 knit round 17-26 1x1 rib k1 p1 at the end of this turn the work inside out so that you are now working on the wrong side and start knitting thus making this the right side this allows the cuff to fold down to prevent a tiny hole where you reverse your knitting direction swap the position of the first and last stitches of the round rounds 27-30 knit knit the instep extension row 1 knit 23 25 stitches turn row 2 s1 p 9 turn row 3 s1 k9 turn repeat row 2 and 3 9 11 times in total this creates the instep and you will have 9 11 chain loops up each side of the instep extension round off the toe of the instep extension a little row 1 s1 p9 turn row 2 s1 k1 ssk k2 k2tog k2 turn 8 stitches row 3 s1 p7 turn pick up stitches around the instep s1 knit 7 pick up and knit into the back of 10 12 stitches down side of instep knit around the cuff to the other side of the instep and pick up and knit into the back of 10 12 stitches along other side of instep knit to end of round stopping at centre back of shoe 54 62 stitches work the s ides of the foot a series of plai n and garter welts p4 rounds k 4 rounds p 4 rounds k one round sole knit in garter stitch row 1 k4 ssk turn row 2 wrong side s1 k8 p2tog turn row 3 right side s1 k8 ssk turn repeat these last 2 row until there are 10 stitches left on the sole and 10 stitches left at the toe if you are working magic loop rearrange your stitches so the needle tips are at the
